    Home CCTV + Cameras

    Protecting your family and your home is a top priority. But with so many options on the market, choosing the right security camera system can be overwhelming.

    Our technicians are highly trained and experienced in installing the latest technology to ensure that you get the best protection possible. With our installation service, you can have peace of mind knowing that your family and home are in safe hands.

    Bullet Cameras

    Placement versatility, weather resistance, and long-range visibility, make these ideal for outdoor surveillance around the home.

    NVRs

    NVR (Network Video Recorder) allow you to store and manage large amounts of video data from multiple IP cameras, providing easy access to recorded footage for future analysis and investigation.

    Turrent Cameras

    Adjustable and flexible design, allowing for easy installation and the ability to capture images/video at different angles and distances.

    PTZ Cameras

    PTZ (Pan-Tilt-Zoom) cameras provide you with control, rotate, tilt, and zoom from anywhere, allowing for a wider range of coverage and a closer look at specific areas of interest.

    4G Cameras (Remote)

    Transmit live video and audio data over cellular networks, providing remote access to real-time surveillance footage without the need for a wired connection.

    Home Security Alarm Systems

    Are you concerned about the safety of your home and family? A home security system installed by licensed electricians and security experts can provide the peace of mind you need. Our experts use the latest technology and their extensive knowledge to design and install a customized security system that meets your specific needs.

    With our home security system installation, you can protect your home from burglaries, fire, and other potential dangers. Our licensed electricians and security experts ensure that your system is installed correctly and functioning properly, so you can feel secure in your home.

    Don't wait until it's too late to secure your home. Contact us today to schedule a consultation with one of our licensed electricians and security experts and take the first step in safeguarding your home and family.

    CCTV Cameras

    Worried about security breaches on your property? Don't risk your safety and peace of mind. Install CCTV cameras to monitor and deter potential intruders.

    Security Monitoring

    Frustrated with the limitations of traditional security measures? Don't settle for outdated protection methods. Our security monitoring services keeps you ahead of threats with our customized security solutions.

    General Access Control

    Frustrated with managing multiple keys and access codes? Don't let the hassle of traditional security measures hold you back. Our home security access control systems provide seamless and easy-to-use solutions from your mobile that allow you to manage access with just a few clicks.

    Sensor Systems

    Worried about burglaries and break-ins? Don't let your home's vulnerability keep you up at night. Our home security sensors detect motion, doors and windows opening, and other potential threats, so you can rest easy knowing your home is protected.

    Remote Mobile Access

    Worried about the security of your home or business when you're away? Don't let distance keep you from keeping an eye on things. Our remote mobile security system access allows you to monitor and control your security system from anywhere, at any time.

    Construction Site Security

    Worried about theft, vandalism, or other security threats at your construction site? Don't let security concerns slow down your progress and cost your money. Our construction site security solutions provide real-time monitoring and alerts to protect your assets and keep your project on track.

    FAQ’S

    Frequently Asked Question

    All of our services are backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee Our electricians.

    • What type of CCTV system should I install for my home in Melbourne?

      The type of CCTV system you should install for your home in Melbourne depends on your specific security needs. There are several options available, including wired, wireless, and IP-based systems. You should consider factors such as the size of your property, the number of cameras required, the level of image resolution, and your budget.

    • How much does it cost to install a security and CCTV system in Melbourne?

      The cost of installing a security and CCTV system in Melbourne can vary greatly depending on the type of system you choose, the number of cameras required, and the level of customization required. It is recommended to obtain quotes from several reputable security and CCTV installation companies in Melbourne to ensure that you are getting a fair price.

    • How can I ensure that my security and CCTV system is installed correctly?

      To ensure that your security and CCTV system is installed correctly, it is recommended to hire a reputable and experienced security and CCTV installation company. They will have the necessary knowledge and expertise to install the system in accordance with industry best practices and will be able to provide ongoing support and maintenance.

    • Will my security and CCTV system be monitored 24/7?

      Whether or not your security and CCTV system is monitored 24/7 depends on the specific system you choose. Some systems offer round-the-clock monitoring by a professional security company, while others are self-monitored by the homeowner. It is important to discuss your monitoring options with your security and CCTV installation company to ensure that your system meets your specific security needs.

    • Do I need a permit to install a security and CCTV system in Melbourne?

      In Melbourne, homeowners do not generally require a permit to install a security and CCTV system. However, if you plan to install outdoor cameras that capture footage beyond your property boundary, you may need to obtain permission from your local council.
